檧字的基本解释

檧
sōng
〔桶檧〕小笼。

檧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sōng］
［《廣韻》蘇公切，平庚，心。］
小笼。

檧字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檧； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页558第02
【廣韻】蘇公切【集韻】蘇叢切，?音鬆。小籠也。【揚子·方言】箸筩，自關而西謂之桶檧。【註】今俗亦通呼小籠爲桶檧。　又【廣韻】先孔切【集韻】損動切，?音㪌sǒng。義同。㪌字原从甬从攵作。

檧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
檧字的起名意思

暂无。

檧

sōng
〔Barrel 檧〕Small cage.
檧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sōng]
["Guangyun" Su Gongqie, Ping Geng, Heart. ]
Xiaolong.
檧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檧; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 558 02
[Guangyun] Su Gongqie [Jiyun] Su Congqie, sound song. Xiaolong also. [Yangtze Dialect] Chopsticks, from Guan to the west, it is called Tongliao. [Note] Nowadays, the common folks also call Xiaolong as Tongcha.　 [Guang Yun] first hole cut [Ji Yun] loss of moving cut, sound 㪌sǒng. The same meaning. The word 㪌 was originally made from Yong Cong Xun.
